import React from "react"; import "../styles/MobileLayout.css"; /** * MobileLayout (updated topbar) * - Two-row topbar: * Row 1: hamburger | logo (left) Sell Buy (right) * Row 2: location pill (left) large rounded search (center/right) * * Children go into the scrollable main area below. */ export default function MobileLayout({ children }) { return (
{/* TOPBAR - two rows */}
{/* Row 1 */}
{/* Row 2 */}
{/* Hero/promo slot (children can render hero or other content) */}
{children}
); }
